headline: Built for AI, Designed for Uptime | ChemTreat Launches CTSolutions速 D2C for Direct-to-Chip Data Center Cooling
summary: ChemTreat, Inc. (ChemTreat), a Veralto company and leading provider of industrial water treatment solutions, today announced the launch of CTSolutions速 D2C, a comprehensive treatment and monitoring program engineered for direct-to-chip (D2C) liquid cooling systems in high-density, AI-driven data centers.
